name: Katabasis (aeonofdiscord)
description:
This is a very short demo experimenting with a few interactions inside a single level; there's one enemy type and an NPC to converse with.

Use WASD, ZQSD or the arrow keys to move, Space to attack, and E to use items. The game will quit when you exit the area; this isn't a crash, but it might look like one.

Katabasis uses the "Basic Pup White" font by @emhuo, which you can get here: https://emhuo.itch.io/nico-pixel-fonts-pack
